UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that may represent a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Antimicrobial D-amino acid oxidase-derived peptides specify gut microbiota.
Literature.Author: Murtas G, Sacchi S, Tedeschi G, Maffioli E, Notomista E, Cafaro V, Abbondi M, Mothet J-P, Pollegioni L

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=>200µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium ATCC 14028(MIC=>200µM),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 29212(MIC=>200µM)
